controls.label: Have you implemented risk-based systems and controls to verify that the association exists and that names of governing committee members have been provided?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based systems and controls

controls.label: Do you collect the full name of incorporated associations?
Do you collect the association's principal place of administration or registered office address, or the residential address of the public officer, president, secretary or treasurer?
Do you collect any unique identifying number issued upon incorporation of the association?
Do you collect the full names of the chairman, secretary and treasurer (or equivalent officers) of the incorporated association?
Do you collect the full name of unincorporated associations where the customer is a member?
Do you collect the principal place of administration address of unincorporated associations (if any)?
Do you collect the full names of the chairman, secretary and treasurer (or equivalent officers) of the unincorporated association?
Do you collect information required for the member (individual) in accordance with your customer identification procedure for individuals?
Have you implemented risk-based systems and controls to determine whether additional KYC information beyond the minimum should be collected about associations?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based approach to additional KYC information

controls.label: Do you verify the full name of incorporated associations using ASIC information, incorporation authority data, association rules or constitution, or reliable independent documents/electronic data?
controls.detail-label: Describe your verification sources and methods

controls.label: Do you verify the unique identifying number of incorporated associations using the above sources?
controls.detail-label: Describe your verification methods for the unique identifier

controls.label: Do you verify the full name of unincorporated associations using the association's rules or constitution, certified copies, or reliable independent documents/electronic data?
controls.detail-label: Describe your verification sources and methods

controls.label: Do you verify information about the member (individual) in accordance with your customer identification procedure for individuals?
Have you implemented risk-based systems and controls to determine whether and to what extent additional collected KYC information should be verified?
controls.detail-label: Describe your risk-based approach to verification of additional information

controls.label: Do your verification procedures use one or more of the following: constitution/rules, certified copies, meeting minutes, ASIC/incorporation authority data, reliable independent documents, or reliable independent electronic data?
controls.detail-label: Specify which verification sources and methods you use

controls.label: Do you use disclosure certificates for verification when information is not otherwise reasonably available and the certificate is used for purposes of risk-based additional KYC assessment?
controls.detail-label: Describe your use of disclosure certificates and the conditions triggering their use

controls.label: Have you implemented risk-based systems and controls to respond to discrepancies identified during verification and to determine whether you remain reasonably satisfied about the association's existence and member committee names?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedures for identifying, investigating and responding to discrepancies

groups.title: General CDD Obligation for Associations
groups.description: Risk-based systems and controls to verify that the association exists and that names of governing committee members have been provided.

groups.title: Collection of KYC Information — Incorporated Associations
groups.description: Minimum KYC information to be collected about incorporated associations.

groups.title: Collection of KYC Information — Unincorporated Associations
groups.description: Minimum KYC information to be collected when a customer is a member of an unincorporated association.

groups.title: Risk-Based Additional KYC Assessment
groups.description: Risk-based determination of whether additional KYC information beyond the minimum should be collected and verified.

groups.title: Verification of Information — Incorporated Associations
groups.description: Verification procedures for incorporated association information using regulatory registries and reliable sources.

groups.title: Verification of Information — Unincorporated Associations
groups.description: Verification procedures for unincorporated association information using constitution, rules, and reliable sources.

groups.title: Verification Methods and Disclosure Certificates
groups.description: Approved methods and sources for verification, including use of disclosure certificates where appropriate.

groups.title: Responding to Verification Discrepancies
groups.description: Risk-based systems and controls to identify and respond to discrepancies discovered during verification.
